I would say that Europe's natural gas future - I wouldn't say its energy future - but its natural gas future is intrinsically linked to Russian energy supplies.

A lot of Russian gas contracts last until the mid 2020s, some last until the mid 2030s.

That Asia has been short of LNG and been prepared to pay far higher prices than Europe.
